function.name: db_errorfb

unit.decl_stmt: static const luaL_Reg dblib[] = { {"debug", db_debug}, {"getfenv", db_getfenv}, {"gethook", db_gethook}, {"getinfo", db_getinfo}, {"getlocal", db_getlocal}, {"getregistry", db_getregistry}, {"getmetatable", db_getmetatable}, {"getupvalue", db_getupvalue}, {"setfenv", db_setfenv}, {"sethook", db_sethook}, {"setlocal", db_setlocal}, {"setmetatable", db_setmetatable}, {"setupvalue", db_setupvalue}, {"traceback", db_errorfb}, {NULL, NULL} };
